description:
cmd/[568]l: do not generate PT_TLS on openbsd

The OpenBSD ld.so(1) does not currently support PT_TLS and refuses
to load ELF binaries that contain PT_TLS sections. Do not emit PT_TLS
sections - we will handle this appropriately in runtime/cgo instead.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2012/11/16 17:39:01, minux wrote:
> i think this warrants a comment in the code.

Done. PTAL.
i think this warrants a comment in the code.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e08535d6901d ***

cmd/[568]l: do not generate PT_TLS on openbsd

The OpenBSD ld.so(1) does not currently support PT_TLS and refuses
to load ELF binaries that contain PT_TLS sections. Do not emit PT_TLS
sections - we will handle this appropriately in runtime/cgo instead.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma, iant
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6846064

subject: code review 6846064: cmd/[568]l: do not generate PT_TLS on openbsd
